name: Thumbspeak
overview:
Introducing Thumbspeak and its mobile opinion network and it’s platform as a service (PaaS) which instantly connects businesses with the consumers they most want to reach.

People using the Thumbspeak Mobile Application, answer quick questions and polls on their iPhones (and soon to be other 3G phones) sent specifically to them by companies and collect rewards. Businesses are able to send questions to specific types of people in precise locations using the Thumbspeak Mobile Targeting Tool at the company website http://www.thumbspeak.com. The company also offers a Platform as as Service solution.

Platform As A Service: -License our platform and customizable apps -Engage your fans and customers -Customize mobile app for events -Integrate mobile with your online community -iPhone Branded App in 30 days or less!
